summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD EXPLORER. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE ELECTRIC POWER STEERING FAILED TO FUNCTION, WHICH CAUSED THE STEERING WHEEL TO JERK WHILE MAKING A TURN. IT WAS EXTREMELY DIFFICULT TO TURN THE STEERING WHEEL IN EITHER DIRECTION. THERE WAS NO WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT HAD TO APPLY EXTREME FORCE WHEN TURNING THE STEERING WHEEL. EVERGREEN FORD LINCOLN (1500 18TH AVE NW, ISSAQUAH, WA 98027, (425) 651-2465) INDICATED THAT THERE WAS A DIAGNOSTIC TROUBLE CODE INDICATING AN INTERMITTENT FAULT AND DIAGNOSED THAT THE STEERING GEAR NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS EXCLUDED FROM NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14V286000 (STEERING). THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 98,000.
